sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; import '../App.css'; function HomePage() { const [webtoons, setWebtoons] = useState([]); const [popular, setPopular] = useState([]); const [likes, setLikes] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { // Fetch webtoons from backend fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/webtoons') .then((response) => { if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } return response.json(); }) .then((data) => setWebtoons(data)) .catch((error) => console.error('Error fetching webtoons:', error)); }, []); useEffect(() => { // Fetch webtoons from backend fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/popular') .then((response) => { if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } return response.json(); }) .then((data) => setPopular(data)) .catch((error) => console.error('Error fetching webtoons:', error)); }, []); const handleLike = (webtoon) => { const token = localStorage.getItem('user'); const userId = localStorage.getItem('userId'); if (!token || !userId) { console.error('No token or userId found'); return; } // Trigger the heart animation animateHeart(webtoon._id); // Send like request fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/favourites/like', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`, }, body: JSON.stringify({ userId, webtoonId: webtoon._id }), }) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log('Webtoon added to favourites:', data); // Update like state for specific webtoon setLikes((prevLikes) => ({ ...prevLikes, [webtoon._id]: true })); // Update favourite count on Navbar updateFavCount(data.favCount); // Pass the new fav count to the Navbar }) .catch((error) => console.error('Error:', error)); }; const animateHeart = (webtoonId) => { const heart = document.getElementById(`heart-${webtoonId}`); heart.classList.add('float-heart'); setTimeout(() => { heart.classList.remove('float-heart'); }, 1000); // Remove animation after 1 second }; return (
